mdRecord.dcterms:description: In 1964 BU Law occupied the bottom half of the current building, 765 Commonwealth Avenue on the Charles River Campus, colloquially known as the "Tower." BU Law shared the Tower with the School of Education for some years but now occupies the entire building. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boston_University_School_of_Law [work]
